metadata.title: CVE-2018-6616 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In OpenJPEG 2.3.0, there is excessive iteration in the opj_t1_encode_cblksfunction of openjp2/t1.c. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted bmp file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
